bibl.title: with contributions from C.A. HOPE, R.G. JENKINS, A.J. MILLS, John L. SHARPE III, Ursula THANHEISER and Guy WAGNER, The Kellis Agricultural Account Book (P. Kell. IV Gr. 96). (Dakhleh Oasis Project: Monograph No. 7 = Oxbow Monograph 92.)
bibl.note: T. Kellis Gr. IV, 96 [faisant suite à: T. Kellis Gr. III, 95]. Codex of wooden tablets containing a set of accounts for an agricultural entity. Kellis, IVth century A. D. (probably in the 360s). - Introduction. - Text and Translation. - Line-by-line Commentary. - Appendix: Fourth-century prices published since 1985 [since the publication of: Roger S. BAGNALL, Currency and Inflation in Fourth Century Egypt = BASP. Supplements. 5 (Missoula, 1985)]. - Indexes.
bibl.seg: BAGNALL Roger S. (edited by), with contributions from C.A. HOPE, R.G. JENKINS, A.J. MILLS, John L. SHARPE III, Ursula THANHEISER and Guy WAGNER, The Kellis Agricultural Account Book (P. Kell. IV Gr. 96). (Dakhleh Oasis Project: Monograph No. 7 = Oxbow Monograph 92.)
Oxford, Oxbow Books, 1997, 4°, xi-253 pp., 1 carte, 2 plans et 20 pll. ISBN 1-900188-40-6. £45.

T. Kellis Gr. IV, 96 [faisant suite à: T. Kellis Gr. III, 95]. Codex of wooden tablets containing a set of accounts for an agricultural entity. Kellis, IVth century A. D. (probably in the 360s). - Introduction. - Text and Translation. - Line-by-line Commentary. - Appendix: Fourth-century prices published since 1985 [since the publication of: Roger S. BAGNALL, Currency and Inflation in Fourth Century Egypt = BASP. Supplements. 5 (Missoula, 1985)]. - Indexes.

C.R. par Jean-Michel Carrié, Antiquité tardive 7 (1999) pp. 331-335. - Sergio Daris, Aegyptus 78 (1998 [2000]) pp. 220-221. - J.E. Goehring, JECS 7 (1999) pp. 174-176. - Andrea Jördens, Gnomon 73 (2001) pp. 424-427. - Dennis P. Kehoe, JRA 12 (1999) pp. 745-751. - Michael Sharp, CR N.S., 50 (2000) pp. 503-504. - J. David Thomas, JEA 86 (2000) pp. 201-202.
Bagnall Hope Jenkins Mills Sharpe Thanheiser Wagner
